list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a dramatic entertainment, originating in Roman mime, in which performers express meaning through gestures accompanied by music.
express or represent (something) by extravagant and exaggerated mime.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the clown candidates pantomimed different emotions
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các ứng cử viên chú hề lan can những cảm xúc khác nhau
